isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE / 2000 4000 and 8000 MODELS BUILT OCTOBER 1, 1998 AND AFTER - ALLISON WT TRANSMISSION WITH WTEC III ELECTRONIC CONTROLS - DESCRIPTION - ANTILOCK BRAKE SYSTEM (ABS) INTERFACE

svcproc.title: ANTILOCK BRAKE SYSTEM (ABS) INTERFACE
svcproc.para: The WT electronic control module is connected to the ABS electronic control module. If the ABS system senses an impending wheel lockup condition and modulates the vehicle brake system, the WT ECU will disengage the transmission lockup clutch, putting the transmission into the hydraulic mode of operation. For WT transmissions equipped with a retarder, the retarder will be "turned off" whenever the ABS system modulates the brake system.
